column5: Starting to get a pretty significant wish list going on, anyone know when the next no tax sale will be at LeB's? Thanks
Are firearms included in the tax free sale?
They were when I bought my shotgun about three years ago.

should be one soon as there were quite a few earlier in the year. I say October. and will apply to most items not on "special" and lately not applicable to CanGoose, but was at one point not too long ago.
They have way too many items marked "special". What a load of $%#!!
I guess the popular items they could knock a few bucks off so that the 13% discount wouldn't apply. Not sure if they do that, just a thought, especially on big ticket items where the tax might be $75
They just got a bunch of new Shimano and Daiwa rods, I doubt they'll have any special soon.
